section.title: Economy Package
section.p: Includes round-trip airfare, 3-star hotel in Cancun, and access to public beaches. Local street food options available.

section.title: Mid-range Package
section.p: Includes round-trip airfare, 4-star all-inclusive resort, a guided tour of Chichen Itza, and dining at mid-range Mexican restaurants.

section.title: Luxury Package
section.p: First-class airfare, 5-star beachfront resort, private yacht tours, exclusive spa treatments, and fine dining in gourmet restaurants.
